exportColumnSqlOverride.sql:
case
            when minority_type_id = 2 then 'Black American'
            when minority_type_id = 3 then 'Hispanic American'
            when minority_type_id = 7 then 'Non-M/WBE'
            when minority_type_id = 9 then 'Women'
            when minority_type_id = 11 then 'Individuals and Others'
            else 'Asian American'
            end as minority_type_name
case when is_prime_or_sub = 'P' then 'No' else 'Yes' end as vendor_type
case when l1.is_prime_or_sub = 'P' then 'N/A' else prime_vendor_name end
case when l1.is_prime_or_sub = 'S' then '' else expenditure_object_names end
case when sub_contract_id IS NULL then 'N/A' else sub_contract_id end
